backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles and surgery case types with authorization checks and CRUD-like operations for profiles and case creation.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing their purpose and major behaviors.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Instructions for redeploying the frontend with fresh backend bindings and troubleshooting connection issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, theme variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/redeploy.sh: Shell script performing deterministic frontend clean rebuild and deployment with backend ID reporting.
Script that removes stale artifacts, reinstalls dependencies, regenerates backend bindings, and builds the frontend.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Guide for verifying that the live frontend is using fresh backend bindings and the correct backend canister ID.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application managing authentication, backend connection, profile setup, case list UI, modals, and sync controls.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Empty or placeholder file for camera-based image capture functionality.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Renders a surgery case card with demographics, tasks, edit/delete actions, and syncs task and deletion updates to local and server stores.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Provides a form for creating or editing surgery cases with prefill, demographics parsing, and task checklist management.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Displays filtered and sorted surgery cases, handling loading states, empty states, and edit triggers.
A date input with calendar popover supporting manual entry, validation, and selection.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Text area that extracts demographics from pasted text and passes structured data to the parent form.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Shows empty-state UI with optional draft-to-live migration guidance based on connection and authentication.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Controls for selecting sort field and toggling ascending or descending order.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Displays and updates required case tasks, normalizing data and toggling task completion.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all locally stored cases to a CSV file and handles success or error notifications.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: CSV import dialog that parses files, shows warnings/errors, and imports cases into the store.
frontend/src/components/errors/BackendCo: Error banner providing troubleshooting steps and retry options for backend connection failures.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modal content that logs errors and displays a fallback UI with a close button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying app info, current year, and a link to caffeine.ai with tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with branding, environment label, and login/logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Startup error screen showing connection issues with retry/reload actions and token-specific guidance.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Status bar showing online status, backend connection state, and sync controls with error feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, initializing access control and refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to track initialization errors and provide retry logic using React Query.
Combines identity and actor state to determine backend connectivity, probing reachability and offering a full retry flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Manages merged local and server surgery cases with normalization plus add, update, delete, and import mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Derives an environment label (Draft or Live) from the current hostname.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling identity load, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks online/offline browser status using window events and returns a boolean.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles and surgery cases using the backend actor with auth-aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Synchronizes pending local surgery case changes with the backend, merging results and updating local storage and query cache.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines TypeScript types for surgery cases, form data, and re-exports backend-related types.
Provides functions to classify backend errors into user-friendly categories and messages.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Handles CSV generation and parsing for surgery cases, including validation and task column handling.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Implements timezone-safe utilities for parsing, formatting, and converting date-only strings and nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsExtract.t: Extracts patient demographics from free text using regex patterns and heuristic parsing.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and checks a draft admin token persisted in URL parameters or session storage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Loads, normalizes, saves, and clears surgery cases in localStorage with BigInt-safe serialization.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases, preserving local-only fields and preparing pending changes for sync.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the latest case by MRN and extracts demographic prefill data for new forms.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities to create, normalize, and derive required tasks from task checklists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project state, feature summaries, and pending feature requests for the Surgery Case Tracker.
